lead_paragraph: Kenya has been given a one-month extension to comply with the World Anti-Doping Agency code and thereby avoid future sanctions, WADA said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: WADA Gives Kenya Another Month's Grace
headline.main: WADA Gives Kenya Another Month's Grace
